item.title: Fourth Sonic the Hedgehog film announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/fourth-sonic-the-hedgehog-film-announced

Plot details to be announced.

A fourth Sonic the Hedgehog theatrical film is currently in development with an anticipated release of spring 2027, SEGA and Paramount announced.

The third movie, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, will premiere in theaters on December 20, and currently has an 86 percent fresh score on Rotten Tomatoes based on 57 critic reviews.

Plot details about Sonic the Hedgehog 4 are still to be announced.

Thanks, Variety.

item.title: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisodes 1 and 2 now available for PS5, coming to Xbox Series and Switch in early 2025
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/to-the-moon-sigmund-minisodes-1-and-2-now-available-for-ps5-coming-to-xbox-series-and-switch-in-early-2025

  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Priced at $2.99 and $1.99, respectively.

Publisher Serenity Forge and developer Freebird Games have released To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 (Holiday Special) and To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2 (Holiday Special) for PlayStation 5 for $2.99 and $1.99, respectively. Xbox Series and Switch versions will follow in early 2025.

Both games were originally released as free downloadable content for the PC version of To the Moon. However, on consoles they are each paid, standalone experiences.

Here is an overview of each game, via Serenity Forge:

To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1

Return to the world of To the Moon in this heartfelt spin-off that dives deeper into the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. During a holiday season filled with both festive cheer and public protests against the Sigmund Corporation, this minisode explores the ethical dilemmas and emotional challenges behind their wish-fulfillment work.

To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2 (Holiday Special)

Step into the next chapter of To the Moon with Sigmund Minisode 2, a poignant holiday-themed spin-off that offers a deeper look at the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. This part continues to explore the personal struggles, mysterious secrets, and ethical dilemmas faced by the doctors of Sigmund Corporation.

Watch a new trailer below.

Consoles Trailer

item.title: Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos release date moved up to January 2 in the west; Switch version DLC ‘Swimsuit Costume Set’ canceled
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/12/neptunia-riders-vs-dogoos-release-date-moved-up-to-january-2-in-the-west-switch-version-dlc-swimsuit-costume-set-canceled

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

Downloadable content will launch for PlayStation versions as planned.

Idea Factory International has moved up Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos from its previously planned January 28, 2025 release in the west by four weeks, to January 2, 2025. It will be available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch.

Additionally, the company announced that the downloadable content “Swimsuit Costume Set” will no longer launch for the Switch version of the game “due to the contents of the Swimsuit Costume Set not complying with Nintendo Guidelines.” Accordingly, the Switch versions of the Magazine and Deluxe editions have been reduced in price. Users who purchase the downloadable content will be required to download and install a patch before installing the content.

The downloadable content “Swimsuit Costume Set” will still be available as planned for the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 versions.

Here is the updated list of content included in the Magazine and Deluxe editions:

Magazine Edition

  • PlayStation 5 / PlayStation 4 ($69.99 / £59.99 / €69.99)
    • Physical game
    • Nepbike Magazine art book (64 pages)
    • Poster set (five fold-out posters)
    • Nepbike sticker set (28 stickers)
    • Official soundtrack (10 tracks)
    • Download code for the Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set (one costume per set for Uzume Neptune, Noire, Blanc, Vert, 15x total)
      • Swimsuit Costume
      • Apocalyptic Costume
      • Race Queen Costume
    • Reversible cover sleeve
    • Exclusive trading card
  • Switch ($66.99 / £56.99 / €66.99)
    • Physical game
    • Nepbike Magazine art nook (64 pages)
    • Poster set (five fold-out posters)
    • Nepbike sticker set (28 stickers)
    • Official soundtrack (10 tracks)
    • Download code for the Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set (one costume per set for Uzume Neptune, Noire, Blanc, Vert, 10x total)
      • Apocalyptic Costume
      • Race Queen Costume
    • Reversible cover sleeve
    • Exclusive trading card

Deluxe Edition

  • PlayStation 5 / PlayStation 4 ($49.99 / £44.99 / €49.99)
    • Digital game
    • Digital art book (35 pages)
    • Soundtrack (10 tracks)
    • Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set (one costume per set for Uzume Neptune, Noire, Blanc, Vert, 15x total)
      • Swimsuit Costume
      • Apocalyptic Costume
      • Race Queen Costume
  • Switch ($46.99 / £42.29 / €46.99)
    • Digital game
    • Digital art book (35 pages)
    • Soundtrack (10 tracks)
    • Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set (one costume per set for Uzume Neptune, Noire, Blanc, Vert, 10x total)
      • Apocalyptic Costume
      • Race Queen Costume

The Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set ($6.99/£6.29/€6.99) will also be available as a standalone downloadable content for PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4 on launch.

The Neptunia Riders VS Dogoos Costume Set without the Swimsuit Costume Set will be available as a standalone downloadable content for Switch ($3.99/£3.59/€3.99) as well.
